Uses of Class
net.theblackchamber.crypto.implementations.SecureProperties

  • Packages that use SecureProperties 
    Package Description
    net.theblackchamber.crypto.util  

    • Uses of SecureProperties in net.theblackchamber.crypto.util

      Methods in net.theblackchamber.crypto.util that return SecureProperties 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SecureProperties SecurePropertiesUtils.encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
      NOTE: The encryption related properties need to be properly set prior to using this.
      static SecureProperties SecurePropertiesUtils.encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties, java.lang.String keyPath, java.lang.String keyPass, java.lang.String keyEntry)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
      Note: Encryption fields passed as parameters WILL NOT be placed into the resulting SecureProperties file.
      static SecureProperties SecurePropertiesUtils.encryptPropertiesFile(java.io.File clearProperties, java.lang.String keyPath, java.lang.String keyPass, java.lang.String keyEntry, boolean retainCrytoConfigProperties)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
